entries.sourceEnglish: Welcome to Fannyside Farm. To the west, our beautiful Heritage Stable and wheat fields.
To the south, our state of the art Mill and Granary.
NEW Government Sponsored Highway: Connecting Urban and Rural Communities
The Long Way to the Forest Shrine
The State of the Art Mill and Granary

entries.context:
The camera zooms out from inside the well. 
We are back at Bumpkin Village with the Herd.
The Herd has just watched Trusty fall down the well.

entries.sourceEnglish: Trusty? Trusty!? P-p-please don't leave us!

entries.context: Soft should be opposite of Hard's name if possible
entries.sourceEnglish: Old Ass and Trusty Ass were not cut out for the role of leader. They were too soft.
You're insulting our Comrades! Only I get to insult our Comrades!
Of course there's a Plan C!
Stop. Who made YOU the leader?
It's time for action, not debate, Hard Ass.
I do not take orders from you.

entries.context: "Let'er RIP" means "Go for it" or "Kick her Ass Hard Ass", or "Don't hold back, Hard Ass"

entries.sourceEnglish: The fire's accelerating on the dry ground.
The enormous flames are spreading west! They'll reach the Farm in no time—
And the others! They'll be in a mighty pickle if we don't git there in time!
ONE, someone races back to the Farm to warn the others.
TWO, someone else pulls the Humans out of the burning buildings.
THREE, the rest of us get water from the river, put out the fire, convince the Humans to give up their Machines...
Slow Ass should stay behind and sing the Song of Ascension for Trusty.
Fine. Slow Ass is dead weight anyways.
Who's going to run back to the Farm?
Nice Ass's fine legs can do that run in less than two minutes! Yeehaw!
Heck, I'd do anything to save our Farm!

entries.context: Nice starts running back to the Farm
entries.sourceEnglish: Good. Run like the wind Nice Ass! And don't ruin my Plan.

entries.context: If Nice Ass touches fire in the village.
If Nice Ass tries to talk to the Herd.
If Nice Ass goes the wrong way.
entries.sourceEnglish: Golly, the smoke must be getting to me. This isn't the way to the Farm at all.

entries.context: If Nice Ass goes the wrong way.
entries.sourceEnglish: Golly, the smoke must be getting to me. This isn't the way to the Farm at all.

entries.context: Nice arrives at the bridge over the river.
entries.sourceEnglish: Golly, looks like the bridge is slowing the fire down.
Sad Ass! Sturdy Ass! Bad Ass! I'm coming for you!

entries.context: Nice arrives at the Farm (ie. does not burn out from hitting too much fire) and is met by Bad Ass
entries.sourceEnglish: What the fuck did you all do?
I thought you were trying to get your jobs back, not burn everything to the ground.
I'll find Sad Ass and Sturdy Ass and take them to the river.
You find a way to stop the fire and save the Farm.

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
If Nice hits too much fire in A1, she blacks out and is awakened by Bad Ass.

entries.sourceEnglish: I found you passed out on the road and had to drag you back here.
I thought you were trying to get your jobs back, not burn everything to the ground.
I can't keep the fire back any longer.
I'll find Sad Ass and Sturdy Ass and take them to the river.
You find a way to stop the fire and save the Farm.

entries.context:
Continuing from the moment after Nice Ass ran to the Farm.
The Herd negotiates how to save the Humans.

entries.sourceEnglish: Who's going to run into the burning houses to save the Humans?
It's too DAMN DRY, I'd never make it.
You want to send your ACE STRATEGIST into a FIRE?! You gotta be joking!

entries.context: Smart Ass looks in all directions.
entries.sourceEnglish: Listen. If we don't save the Humans, who will bring us our Hay?
Who will scratch the inside of our ears?
Who will give us medicine when we're ill?
Who will clean the shit out of our beds?
Who will GIVE US OUR JOBS BACK?
Okay, we're all set for Plan C!
ONE, Nice Ass saves the Farm.
TWO, Hard Ass saves the Humans.
THREE, the rest of us get water from the river, put out the fire, convince the Humans to give up their Machines...
And I'll sing the Song of Ascension for Trusty.

entries.context: The other donkeys run off to fetch water

entries.sourceEnglish: I've been through worse than a burning building.

entries.context: Hard looks for houses to enter
If Hard Ass goes in the wrong direction.
Slow Ass stays behind to sing for Trusty.

entries.sourceEnglish: {color=yellow}{s=5}♪  hee haw hi hon 'ee ah he a'w ♪{/s}{/color}

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
Hard enters a house to find a child trapped under a bookcase.

entries.sourceEnglish: Hey! Over here! Under the bookcase!
Get that bucket of water over there and stop this fire from burning me!

entries.context: Hard Ass has a traumatic flash back of seeing a Miner be crushed during a cave in.

entries.sourceEnglish: Animals are supposed to do what Humans say!
Grandma always said donkeys were WORTHLESS!
I bet you don't even have a SOUL!

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm

entries.context: The camera fades up from black and we see Nice Ass with her plow, just outside the Fannyside Farm.
entries.sourceEnglish: The Herd is counting on me! Yuppers, this is what I've been training for!

entries.context: Nice Ass begins to plow a fire line, cutting off the fire.
entries.sourceEnglish: If I plow like I've never plowed before, I can cut the fire off and save our beautiful Farm!

entries.context: Nice Ass succeeds with the first line of defense.
A fire ball flies on the wind and ignites a tree.

entries.sourceEnglish: Jeepers! It's spreading across the Forest!
Yikes! We're going to lose the whole field!

entries.context: Nice Ass plows west to attempt saving the Farm.
entries.sourceEnglish: If I cut the fire off at the centre, I can still save the North Half of the Farm.

entries.context: Nice Ass makes it close to the Outhouse on the Farm and hears something.

entries.sourceEnglish: I've got to make it to the Outhouse before it's too late!

entries.context: If Nice Ass hits too much fire.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm

entries.context: After Hard Ass exits the Child's house.

entries.sourceEnglish: Did I let that little Human die?

entries.context: Note to future Patrick/Milton: solve the quotation issue in the CSV
entries.sourceEnglish: "You only hit rock bottom when you quit."

entries.context: If Hard Ass goes in the wrong direction.
Slow Ass is still singing for Trusty

entries.sourceEnglish: {color=yellow}{s=5}♪  hee haw hi hon 'ee ah he a'w ♪{/s}{/color}

entries.context: After Hard Ass exits the Miner's House, and as he is looking for the Boss's house.
entries.sourceEnglish: The Boss's house must be around here somewhere.

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
Hard Ass enters the house of Miner Jenny.
entries.sourceEnglish: A donkey? How'd you get here from the Mines?
It's me! Jenny. From the night shift.
Run into the flames and grab my Computer!
What, you can't hear me with those big dumb donkey ears?

entries.context: A screen wipe (transition), Hard Ass has to fight Miner Jenny.
entries.sourceEnglish: Fine, I'll MAKE YOU DO IT!

entries.context: After killing Miner Jenny in battle.

entries.sourceEnglish: The Humans don't deserve our labour.
So, it has come to this.
That Machine is more valuable to her than my life?
After all those years working side by side in the Mine...
Because I wouldn't save her Computer-Machine.
Not when they don't see us as equals.

entries.context: Hard Ass can now leave the house.
entries.sourceEnglish: No more Protests—it's time for Revolution.

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm

entries.sourceEnglish: Ugh. I always knew you were a dumb beast.
My Computer is worth a THOUSAND DONKEYS!
So help me God, I will END YOU!!

entries.context: Enemy dialogue. Jenny is close to death.
entries.sourceEnglish: Is this... game over for me?
You Grunt. Miner Jenny becomes angry.
You Bray. Miner Jenny is confused.

entries.context: Hard stands in front of a painting of a donkey and a prophet.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
Hard Ass enters Mr. Butte's house from the bottom floor.
Upon heading upstairs, Hard Ass finds Mr. Butte, who is drunk.

entries.sourceEnglish: It's me, Mr. Butte. The Boss.
*sigh* I guess replacing you donkeys made no difference.
But business is business, you know?
New Machines for a new era.
You can't run a Coal Mine with just donkeys—it's the 21st century!
The world is burning and God sends me an Ass instead of an Angel.
Ah, what the hell. Look at me. Talking to a donkey again...

entries.context: Screen wipe (transition) to a battle between Mr. Butte and Hard Ass.
If Hard Ass attempts to leave.
After killing Mr. Butte in the battle. Hard Ass stands in Mr. Butte's house, everything is on fire.
Hard Ass can try to leave now.
entries.sourceEnglish: A world where Asses are their own Masters...

entries.context: As Hard Ass attempts to leave, the door caves in.

entries.sourceEnglish: I have to get back to the Herd.

entries.context: The roof collapses on Hard Ass.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm

entries.sourceEnglish: Mr. Butte stares at you confused.

entries.context: Enemy dialogue. If Butte's health is less than 40%.
entries.sourceEnglish: Why are you hurting me?\nI don't understand!

entries.context: Enemy dialogue. Butte is about to die.

entries.sourceEnglish: I was just trying to make money!\nYou gotta understand!

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
Nice Ass arrives at the Outhouse.

entries.sourceEnglish: Sad Ass! Quit hiding in the outhouse!
I don't have it in me to move... I'm all alone...
Gee Comrade, that's not true! All of us care about you. We're here for ya!
C'mon Comrade, we have to go now!
C'mon Comrade, we have to go now!
Sad Ass, now is not the time for this, please!
I'm a monster... A worthless beast...
I spend my days doing nothing...
I-I didn't mean for things to get this out of control...
You're lying... I'm so skinny you can see my ribs through my fur...
I'm so tired... I barely made it back...
Listen, I don't know what you're talking about—
Has anyone been hurt in the fire...?
Tell him Trusty Ass died falling down the well.
Trusty Ass fell down the well trying to get water...and died.
They're trapped inside their homes burning alive.
They're trapped inside their homes burning alive.
The others are rescuing the Humans as we speak.
I'm sure the others are rescuing the Humans as we speak.
I was just trying to help...
I only meant to destroy one of the Humans' ugly Car-Machines, not set everything ablaze!!
Accidents happen all the time, we can fix this!
Accidents happen all the time, we can fix this!
I promise we can! But by golly you have to come with me now!
The Farm—our home! Sad Ass, how could you?!
I don't belong on this Farm...
My heart is buried under layers of coal...
Is life supposed to be so full of pain?
Lean your head against the door in silence.
Look back at the Farm as it burns.
Tell me the truth... Do you remember the colour of Lazy's beautiful eyes?

entries.context: If the Player chooses the wrong eye colour.

entries.sourceEnglish: No wait! I remember! They were:

entries.context: If the Player chooses the correct eye colour.

entries.sourceEnglish: Nice Ass, I never meant for this to happen...
Please, promise me you'll keep this secret between you and me...?
I'll keep your secret for the rest of my life.
I'm sorry, you won't be able to plow these fields anymore...

entries.context: Nice Ass consoles Sad Ass as the rain starts to put out the fire.
entries.sourceEnglish: Sad Ass, this rain is a sign that we can start again!
We'll do what we do best—move forward one little step at a time.
No matter how uneven the ground.
I'm sure our Comrades have saved the Humans.
And the Humans are in the streets cheering.
They are singing their hearts out and dancing their butts off!
They will make today one of their annual holidays.
They will erect golden statues of heroic Asses and gather to commemorate us.
Gosh, even one for Lazy Ass!
They will break down their Machines and throw them away.
And Humans will never call us worthless again.
YUPPERS, WE'RE GOING BACK TO WORK!
